\par
@-moz-document domain("www.heroes.dk") \{\par
\par
.ForumTopInfo\{\par
\tab color : #FFF0F0 !important;\par
\tab font-weight: bold !important;\par
\tab font-size: 10px !important;\par
\tab vertical-align: bottom !important;\par
\tab font-family: bold !important;\par
\tab background-color: #930223 !important;\par
\}\par
.ForumTopHeader \{\par
\tab\tab color : #FFFFFF !important;\par
\tab\tab font-family : bold !important;\par
\tab\tab font-weight : bold !important;\par
\tab\tab font-size: 13px !important;\par
\}\par
.ForumListTD * a \{\par
color: #FFb3b3 !important;\par
font-size: 13px !important;\par
\}\par
.ForumListTD a:visited \{\par
color: #FFD0D0 !important;\par
font-size: 13px !important;\par
\}\par
td.ForumListTD  a \{\par
color: #FFb3b3 !important;\par
\}\par
.ForumListTD * font \{\par
        \par
\tab color: #FFb3b3 !important;\par
\}\par
.ForumListTD \{\par
        color: #FFD0D0 !important;\par
\tab font-size: 12px !important;\par
\tab font-family: bold !important;\par
\tab background-color: #690118 !important;\par
\}\par
font.ForumNew \{\par
        text-decoration: underline !important;\par
\tab color: yellow !important;\par
\tab font-family: bold !important;\par
\tab font-size: 10px !important;\par
\tab\}\par
\tab\par
font.ForumNewReplies\par
\{\par
\tab color: yellow !important;\par
\tab font-size: 10px !important;\par
\}\par
\par
.ForumSubjectPaging \{\par
\tab font-size: 10px !important;\par
\tab color: BLACK !important;\par
\}\par
\par
.ForumOuterTable \{\par
\tab\tab background: #410110 !important\par
\}\par
.ForumText \{\par
\tab\tab background-color : #690118 !important;\par
\tab\tab font-family : bold !important;\par
\tab\tab color : #FFF0F0 !important;\par
\tab\tab font-size: 13px !important;\tab\par
\tab\}\par
\tab .ForumSmallText \{\par
\tab\tab background-color : #690118 !important;\par
\tab\tab font-family : bold !important;\par
\tab\tab color : #FFFFFF !important;\par
\tab\tab font-size: 10px !important;\tab\par
\tab\}\par
\tab .ForumSmallText a \par
\tab\{\par
\tab\tab color: #FFD0D0 !important;\par
\tab\tab\}\par
\tab .ForumDescription \{\par
\tab\tab font-size: 10px !important;\par
\tab\tab color: #FF8a8a !important;\par
\tab\}\par
\tab .ForumName \{\par
\tab\tab font-size: 13px !important;\par
\tab\tab font-weight : bold !important;\par
\tab\}\par
\tab\par
\tab .ForumSearchHit \par
\tab\{\par
\tab\tab background:yellow !important; \par
\tab\tab color:black !important\tab\par
\tab\tab\}\par
\par
\}\par
}
